main event: A civilian pilot and engineers reported a sighting of an unidentified aerial object over Cuba on October 31, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as aluminum with a blue flame., The size of the object was noted as terrific., The object was observed at an altitude of over 5,000 feet., The speed was reported as faster than a meteor., The duration of the sighting was just 3 seconds.
sighted object: unidentified aerial object with aluminum and blue flame
